name: AndroidUtilCode
author: Copyright 2017 Blankj
describes: Android developers should collect the following utils(updating).

name: Material Design
author: Templarian
describes: 5400+ Material Design Icons from the Community

name: androidsvg
author: BigBadaboom
describes: AndroidSVG is a SVG parser and renderer for Android. It has almost complete support for the static visual elements of the SVG 1.1 and SVG 1.2 Tiny specifications (except for filters).

name: SVG-Android
author: Copyright (C) 2017, Megatron King
describes: SVG-Android is a support library for showing svg images in android 4.0+

name: Gson
author: Copyright 2008 Google Inc.
describes: A Java serialization/deserialization library to convert Java Objects into JSON and back

name: MagicIndicator
author: Copyright (c) 2016 hackware1993
describes: A powerful, customizable and extensible ViewPager indicator framework. As the best alternative of ViewPagerIndicator, TabLayout and PagerSlidingTabStrip.

name: BaseRecyclerViewAdapterHelper
author: Copyright (c) 2019 陈宇明
describes: Powerful and flexible RecyclerView Adapter, Please feel free to use this.

name: RecyclerView-FastScroll
author: Copyright (C) 2016 Tim Malseed
describes: A simple FastScroller for Android's RecyclerView.

name: EmptyView
author: Copyright 2017 Fatih Santalu
describes: A view that displays states of screen like loadingType, error, empty etc.

name: Color Picker
author: Copyright 2014-2017 QuadFlask
describes: simple android color picker with color wheel and lightness bar.

name: dom4j
author: Copyright 2001-2016 (C) MetaStuff, Ltd. and DOM4J contributors.
describes: dom4j is an open source framework for processing XML which is integrated with XPath and fully supports DOM, SAX, JAXP and the Java platform such as Java 2 Collections.

name: FreeReflection
author: Copyright (c) 2018 weishu
describes: A library that lets you use reflection without any restriction above Android P
